user_review: Everything is perfect. We ordered via Uber. Everything is well packed. The quality is amazing... they don't cut corners. Every sauce, mayo, side salad, coleslaw is perfectly balanced.We will definitely be regulars!

Finally got to try this place! I ended having their Captain crunch burger, it was huge but so delicious. It had these generous pieces of fried chicken and a perfect mix of coleslaw in the bun. The chicken was just the perfect crispy. I also got a sample of their spicy sauce, which I immediately fell in love with. I'm definitely going back to pick up some if that homemade spicy sauce. I also want to try everything else on their menu!

Best chicken in Montreal, without a doubt. Definitely worth the trip from wherever in the area you are. Very very good food. Quality ingredients, and a very creative menu without having so much to choose from that you have trouble deciding. To make it even better, the people who work there are just fantastic. I hope this place takes around for a long time!
